title: Complete comprehensive testing analysis for CareerJourney codebase
description: Analyze testing infrastructure, identify gaps, compare with Apple Sample Code patterns, and provide detailed recommendations for Swift Testing framework implementation, CI/CD setup, and quality assurance processes. Focus on Swift Testing framework, comprehensive coverage, and reliable CI/CD.
notes: Completed comprehensive testing analysis report. Identified complete absence of testing infrastructure, provided detailed recommendations for Swift Testing implementation, CI/CD setup, and cross-platform testing. Analysis appended to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md section [7].

title: Complete comprehensive animation and micro-interactions analysis
description: Analyze CareerJourney animations, transitions, feedback patterns. Compare against SwiftDB/macOS-26-Boilerplate AnimationSystem.swift. Identify performance issues, missing feedback, cross-platform adaptations. Provide detailed implementation recommendations.
notes: Completed comprehensive animation analysis with detailed recommendations, performance analysis, and implementation roadmap. Updated ANIMATION_ANALYSIS_REPORT.md and CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md with findings.
